mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_notification (user_id, related_id, type, title, message, is_read, is_action_required, user_reply, batch_id, sender_name, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{relatedId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{message}, FALSE, #{isActionRequired}, #{userReply}, #{batchId}, #{senderName}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_notification SET user_reply = #{userReply}, is_read = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_notification SET is_read = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_notification WHERE batch_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY batch_id ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT n.id, n.is_read as isRead, n.user_reply as userReply, n.create_time as createTime, u.real_name as realName, u.username as username, u.role_type as roleType FROM sys_notification n LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.batch_id = #{batchId}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN n.is_read = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS readCount, SUM(CASE WHEN n.user_reply IS NOT NULL AND n.user_reply <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS replyCount, MAX(n.is_action_required) AS needReply FROM sys_notification n WHERE n.batch_id = #{batchId}
